name: Panasonic NN-ST34NB 25L Solo Microwave Oven
details:
Description

Panasonic NN-ST34NB 25L Solo Microwave Oven

The Panasonic NN-ST34NB 25L Solo Microwave Oven is a versatile and efficient kitchen gadget that makes cooking and reheating dishes quick and easy. With its 25L capacity and strong 900W microwave output, it's perfect for small to medium-sized homes. The five power settings on this microwave—High (900W), Med-High (500W), Medium (400W), Defrost (200W), and Low (100W)—offer versatility for a variety of culinary applications. Its 4-digit LCD panel with membrane controls is simple to use, and its push-open door gives it a sleek, contemporary appearance. Additionally, the Panasonic NN-ST34NB 25L Microwave Oven has 10 auto-programmed cooking modes that make meal preparation easier by automatically modifying power levels and cooking periods for typical meals. You can effectively thaw frozen items with the Auto Defrost feature, and you may immediately begin cooking or warming food in 30-second increments with the Quick 30 function. During operation, the "Add Time" feature allows you to increase the cooking time in increments of one minute or ten seconds for increased convenience. The Panasonic NN-ST34NB 25L Microwave Oven prioritizes safety as well. To prevent minors from using it accidentally, it has a child lock feature that is simple to activate by pushing the start button three times. You have more control over complicated meals because to the microwave's stage cooking feature, which lets you cook up to three separate phases in a single program. It uses 1330W of power, yet even without the more sophisticated cleaning features like Steam Clean or Aqua, it is still quite energy-efficient. A dependable, feature-rich solo microwave oven that blends performance, safety, and convenience, the Panasonic NN-ST34NB 25L Solo Microwave Oven is a great addition to any kitchen. For a variety of culinary demands, its power settings, cooking options, and user-friendly design guarantee simple operation.
